sn35.152:1.1: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
sn35.152:1.3: Evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
sn35.152:1.4: ‘dukkhassa kho, avuso, parinnaya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti.
sn35.152:1.5: Sace pana vo, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
sn35.152:1.6: ‘katamam panavuso, dukkham, yassa parinnaya samane gotame brahmacariyam vussati’ti?
sn35.152:1.7: Evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
sn35.152:2.9: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkham;
sn35.152:2.14: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkham;
sn35.152:2.18: Evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha”ti.
